name: Sleep Well (Prologi)
description:
I dreamed about it last sleepless night.

It's just art slow game with two game modes. There's just slowly falling fox in the skies and smooth soundtrack in both of them, but there's some rotating obstacles in the Nightmare mode.

Just relax and fly through 6 nice music tracks.

Controls

WASD - Move

SPACE - Dash

Q & E - Change sky color (Hold)

Z & C - Change sky saturation (Hold)

1 - Change song
